promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic simple bison grass-type pokemon with leafy horns. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or bison. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Leafalon, a a dynamic simple bison grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Time Trap, Synchro Removal. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bison", "grass" or "Leafalon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, bison-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Roaming the forest, this verdant behemoth is known to control time flow. Using Synchro Removal, it keeps the woods unruffled, ever green.
